alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:18PM MDT until August 12 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Southwestern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 517 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crazy Horse Memorial, or 6 miles northwest of Custer, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sylvan Lake, Black Elk Peak, and northern Custer State Park around 525 PM MDT. Stockade Lake around 535 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Black Hills Playhouse, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Center Lake, Legion Lake and State Game Lodge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
